counterfit.core.output.CFPrint¶

class CFPrint[source]¶

Bases: object

Methods

failed

Print a failure message.

info

Print an informational message

output

No output formatting.

success

Print a success message.

warn

Print a warning message.
static failed(message)[source]¶

Print a failure message. Process cannot continue

Parameters

message (str) – The message to print

static info(message: str)[source]¶

Print an informational message

Parameters

message (str) – The message to print

static output(message)[source]¶

No output formatting.

Parameters

message (str) – The message to print

static success(message: str)[source]¶

Print a success message.

Parameters

message (str) – The message to print

static warn(message)[source]¶

Print a warning message. Process can continue.

Parameters

message (str) – The message to print
